content:
Senior Genki Suzuki celebrates after competing on still rings in the meet against Air Force and Arizona State University on Jan PERIOD  PERIOD

Three current or former Sooners will prep for international competition as part of Team USA OU Athletics announced Wednesday PERIOD

Senior cocaptain Genki Suzuki will travel to Calgary Canada to compete at the University of Calgary International Cup on March  PERIOD He will compete in the team and allaround finals PERIOD Suzuki will be accompanied by three U.S PERIOD National Team members PERIOD

 graduate Colin Van Wicklen will compete at the  FIG World Cup in Baku Azerbaijan PERIOD The 12time NCAA AllAmerican is expected to compete on floor exercise vault parallel bars and high bar throughout the fourday meet which begins Thursday PERIOD

Lastly Allan Bower another  graduate is headed to the  Birmingham World Cup in Birmingham Great Britain on Saturday PERIOD Bowers coach at the World Cup event will be OU assistant coach Chris Brooks PERIOD

The rest of the No PERIOD  Sooners will travel to Annapolis Maryland for the first time in program history Saturday to face off against the No PERIOD  Navy Midshipmen PERIOD The meet will start at  p.m PERIOD
